Package helper

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
helper.Helper
public abstract class Helper extends Object
This class provides helper methods to the rest of the program

    • fillTableView

      public static void fillTableView(javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView, javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.collections.ObservableList> data, ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Dynamically fills table view using a lambda expression with for loops and while loops The lambda function sets the table column's name when grabbed from the database using a simple string property Converts date and time from UTC to the user's local timezone
      Parameters:
      data - Observable list of observable list of data to be put into the tableview that is grabbed from the database
      rs - result set from running the JDBC MYSQL query
      tableView - table view that will be populated with the result set data from the observable list
      Throws:
      SQLException
